prompts: Create a Pokemon resembling a giraffe with yellow and brown patterns, and a unique tail.
Show me a playful, psychic-type Pokemon that has a mix of yellow and brown colors.
Imagine a quirky Pokemon that combines giraffe features with a brown and yellow color scheme.
Design a cheerful, bipedal Pokemon with distinctive markings and a fun personality.
Make a unique Pokemon that has a giraffe-like body and a tail with an interesting design.
Generate an adorable Pokemon that embodies grace and has a striking dual-color appearance.
Give me an example of a Pokemon that blends animal traits with bright yellow accents.
